channel.title: [667] RuneGalaxy
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZFvtK5Q.gif[/img]
Runegalaxy, a 667 revision running 725 cache Eco server, has been around since the summer of 2012, has gone through it's ups and downs, and is now under my ownership, and I'm ready to take on the task of restoring it to its formal glory.
With our developer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AecjO.png[/img][URL=http://"http://runegalaxy.net/member.php?u=111"]Tato[/URL] , constantly fixing and updating our server with content, we're on a one way track to success.
~Here are some things you'll find on your adventure with RuneGalaxy~ [SPOILER=Server Content] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TVHABX5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kgU8rSp.png?1[/img]
~Custom Items~ [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pNozDyU.png?1[/img] *Custom items were designed by our old developer, Alex. (My Little Pony, A-Flyer, MLP) Credit was due there. [/SPOILER] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/km8Kp7a.png[/img]Donator bonuses[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/km8Kp7a.png[/img]
[SPOILER=Donator Availabilities][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FfOk7YY.png?1[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2oYgH1r.png?1[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Akwcl3w.png?1[/img]
[/SPOILER]
Also on your adventure you will find-
-A friendly, yet still blooming community -Active and friendly staff -Our RuneGalaxy Point System, to earn and spend points gained from skilling -24/7 website uptime
And so much more, It's hard to list it all :o
So Visit us TODAY!
Forums: [url=http://www.runegalaxy.net/]http://www.runegalaxy.net/[/url]
Play Now: (JRE 8 client)
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/u3si89ec59umdf4/Runegalaxy.jar]http://www.mediafire.com/download/u3si89ec59umdf4/Runegalaxy.jar[/url]
(JRE 7 client)
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/duexd8jcp7j9wei/runegalaxyjre7.jar]http://www.mediafire.com/download/duexd8jcp7j9wei/runegalaxyjre7.jar[/url]
Vote: [url=http://www.runegalaxy.org/Vote.php]http://www.runegalaxy.org/Vote.php[/url]
Donate (PM [URL=http://"http://runegalaxy.net/member.php?u=23"][COLOR=Red][B][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uWHy4.png[/img]Richie[/B][/COLOR][/URL] to work out payments.):
[/CENTER]

item.title: [667] RuneGalaxy

item.description:

[CENTER]

Runegalaxy, a 667 revision running 725 cache Eco server,
has been around since the summer of 2012,
has gone through it’s ups and downs, and is now under my ownership,
and I’m ready to take on the task of restoring it to its formal glory.

With our developer [URL=http://“http://runegalaxy.net/member.php?u=111”]Tato[/URL] , constantly fixing and updating our server with content,
we’re on a one way track to success.
